name: Go, Little Mole!
description:
Go, Little Mole! is a short puzzle platformer featuring this little mole guy.

He can dig into dirt and move around freely inside, he can even launch himself out of the dirt higher than he can jump while walking!

Controls

Walking

A/D - Walk

Space - Jump

Walk into dirt (or press down when standing on dirt) to start digging!

Dig

WASD - Dig

You can only dig in dirt (the brown zig-zaggy stuff). Dig out of dirt to stop digging automatically!
